Process and Call Handling

7. Did the agent say thank you for calling and successfully greet the caller?
Comment:
8. Did the agent use the customer's and his/her name?
Comment:
9. Did the agent provide accurate information to customer questions?
Comment:
10. Did the agent adapt the correct procedures followed for placing a customer on "HOLD." and while transferring the customer (Warm transfers)?
Comment:
11. Did the agent verified the Account information? (Company name and Site ID)
Comment:
12. Did the agent have sufficient product knowledge? (Process knowledge - Easily transition into case/request using the correct process , Case for every call (follow up if unresolved on call)
Comment:
13. Did the agent probe more to get the right reason for the call ?
Comment:
14. Was the agent ready to take the call ? - (Avoiding chewing, eating or drinking while speaking during the call).
Comment:
15. Did the agent follow the First call guidelines ? - (Using the correct product and component code)
Comment:
16. Did the agent offered an appropriate timescale for the solution to the customer? - Misleading information (Example sev2 - don’t say within 1 hour) guidelines ? - (Using the correct product and component code)
Comment:
17. Did the agent Provide accurate and complete information to the caller ? (Providing the case number and what is happening next is understood by the customer )
Comment:
18. Did the agent Documented the case? - Documenting information in order to avoid requesting for it to be repeated
Comment:
19. Did the agent ask the the customer if they have any additional questions/concerns?
Comment:
20. Did the agent follow proper closing script?
Comment:
21. Did the agent provide Self service Communities? / The customer was notified of all relevant documentation.

COMMUNICATION -30

22. Did the agent avoid using Jargans, slang and fillers?
Comment:
23. Did the agent provide accurate information to customer questions? -Setting customer's expectations
Comment:
24. Did Agent demonstrated active listening? (Avoided asking for the same type of information on several occasions, and proactively attempted to eliminate future questions/problem).
Comment:
25.Did the agent confirmed the contact information Phonetically? - (Verifying information by checking spellinng and contact details.)
Comment:
26. Did the agent empathize with the customer? Empathy - Care Politeness (Use of “Please” and/or “Thank you” when asking customer for information or after it has been provided by the customer) (Using the customer's name to show they know, care and establishing rapport with the customer.)
Comment:
27. Did the agent speak politely and clearly with accurate tone to the Client?
